availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, law student and attorney. Notary public for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Cincinnati, Ohio, in 1860. Law student in Cincinnati in 1861. Attorney in Cincinnati in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Williams' Cincinnati Directory: City Guide and Business Mirror, Together with the Directories of the Cities of Covington and Newport, KY., for 1861 (Cincinnati: Williams & Co., 1861), 115.
Williams' Cincinnati Directory for 1862 (Cincinnati: Williams & Co., 1862), 110.
KYR-0001-017-0009.
